message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to acquire a valuable product. I believe this product will bring you significant value, and I'm willing to start the negotiation at a price of $900000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $750000. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Hi Bob, thank you for your counteroffer of $750000. I appreciate your interest in the product, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $825000. Let me know if this is more to your liking.

Hello Alice, thank you for your counteroffer. I understand your position, but I still feel that $750000 was a fair starting point. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $800000. I hope this brings us closer to a mutually beneficial agreement.
